Title: Coming Soon
Plot: Allison runs into the man who kidnapped her daughter in one of her dreams at the District Attorney's office. She learns that he is a "Good Samaritan" who witnessed a robbery and is fully cooperating. After learning that he has kidnapped multiple young women, Allison reaches a roadblock in her investigation that leads her to yet another unbelievable breakthrough in the case.  Meanwhile, Joe tutors Ariel in math, which in turn brings Allison to another shocking discovery.
GuestStars: Wendi Bromley, Khrystyne Haje, Reed Diamond, Camryn Grimes, Vince Duvall, Rachel Kimsey, Caroline Marcelle
